aprove

Class GlobalSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • aprove.GlobalSettings

  • public final class GlobalSettings
extends java.lang.Object
    This file contains local settings. It should never be checked into version control. This class is not intended to be instantiated. All properties should be static and final, so that an optimizing compiler can replace and evaluate references at compile time.
    Author:
    cotto

        static final boolean logExceptionsInBenchmarkMode
